HomeWiki:
Project Description
The objective of this project is to share our's components used in our company with the open source world.
There you will find controls and utilities for both windows forms and WPF

OrangeBit is a company that develop software and web sites using .NET and C#, we opened this place for sharing some of our internal code with the open source world.
If you wan't to know more about us or just find some documentation's about the code hosted here just go to our web site http://www.orangebit.it
